trans-unit.resname: M14·2 | Ajani's Chosen | Card Name
M14·2 | Ajani's Chosen | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, create a 2/2 white Cat creature token. If that enchantment is an Aura, you may attach it to the token.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个结界在你的操控下进战场时，将一个2/2白色的猫衍生生物放进战场。若该结界是灵气，你可以将它结附在该衍生物上。

trans-unit.resname: M14·3 | Angelic Accord | Card Name
M14·3 | Angelic Accord | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each end step, if you gained 4 or more life this turn, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 在每个结束步骤开始时，若本回合中你获得了4点或更多生命，则派出一个4/4白色，具飞行异能的天使衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: M14·5 | Archangel of Thune | Card Name
M14·5 | Archangel of Thune | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nLifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)\nWhenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
trans-unit.target: 飞行，系命\n每当你获得生命时，在每个由你操控的生物上各放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: M14·7 | Banisher Priest | Card Name
M14·7 | Banisher Priest | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until CARDNAME leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，放逐目标由对手操控的生物，直到CARDNAME离开战场为止。

trans-unit.resname: M14·12 | Celestial Flare | Card Name
M14·12 | Celestial Flare | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player sacrifices an attacking or blocking creature.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手牺牲一个进行攻击或阻挡的生物。

trans-unit.resname: M14·13 | Charging Griffin | Card Name
M14·13 | Charging Griffin | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行（此生物只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。）每当CARDNAME攻击时，它得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: M14·15 | Dawnstrike Paladin | Card Name
M14·15 | Dawnstrike Paladin | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)\nLifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
trans-unit.target: 警戒（此生物攻击时不需横置。）系命（此生物所造成的伤害会让你获得等量的生命。）

trans-unit.resname: M14·16 | Devout Invocation | Card Name
M14·16 | Devout Invocation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Tap any number of untapped creatures you control. Create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying for each creature tapped this way.
trans-unit.target: 横置任意数量由你操控且未横置的生物。每以此法横置一个生物，便将一个4/4白色，具飞行异能的天使衍生生物放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: M14·18 | Fiendslayer Paladin | Card Name
M14·18 | Fiendslayer Paladin | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)\nLifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)\nCARDNAME can't be the target of black or red spells your opponents control.
trans-unit.target: 先攻（此生物会比不具先攻异能的生物提前造成战斗伤害。） 系命（此生物所造成的伤害会让你获得等量的生命。）CARDNAME不能成为由对手操控之黑色或红色咒语的目标。

trans-unit.resname: M14·22 | Imposing Sovereign | Card Name
M14·22 | Imposing Sovereign | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 由对手操控的生物须横置进战场。

trans-unit.resname: M14·24 | Master of Diversion | Card Name
M14·24 | Master of Diversion | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，横置目标由防御牌手操控的生物。

trans-unit.resname: M14·26 | Path of Bravery | Card Name
M14·26 | Path of Bravery | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As long as your life total is greater than or equal to your starting life total, creatures you control get +1/+1.
trans-unit.target: 只要你的总生命大于或等于你的起始总生命，由你操控的生物便得+1/+1。

trans-unit.resname: M14·26 | Path of Bravery | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more creatures you control attack, you gain life equal to the number of attacking creatures.
trans-unit.target: 每当由你操控的一个或数个生物攻击时，你获得若干生命，其数量等同于进行攻击的生物数量。

trans-unit.resname: M14·30 | Sentinel Sliver | Card Name
M14·30 | Sentinel Sliver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sliver creatures you control have vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause them to tap.)
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的裂片妖生物具有警戒异能。（它们攻击时不需横置。）

trans-unit.resname: M14·31 | Seraph of the Sword | Card Name
M14·31 | Seraph of the Sword | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nPrevent all combat damage that would be dealt to CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 飞行防止将对CARDNAME造成的所有战斗伤害。

trans-unit.resname: M14·37 | Soulmender | Card Name
M14·37 | Soulmender | Card Text | Paragraph 1

M14·38 | Steelform Sliver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的裂片妖生物得+0/+1。

trans-unit.resname: M14·39 | Stonehorn Chanter | Card Name
M14·39 | Stonehorn Chanter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {5}{W}: CARDNAME gains vigilance and lifelink until end of turn. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap. Damage dealt by it also causes you to gain that much life.)
trans-unit.target: {5}{W}：CARDNAME获得警戒与系命异能直到回合结束。（此生物攻击时不需横置。它所造成的伤害会让你获得等量的生命。）

trans-unit.resname: M14·50 | Dismiss into Dream | Card Name
M14·50 | Dismiss into Dream | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each creature your opponents control is an Illusion in addition to its other types and has "When this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it."
trans-unit.target: 由对手操控的每个生物均额外具有「虚影」此类别，且都具有「当此生物成为咒语或异能的目标时，将它牺牲。」

trans-unit.resname: M14·54 | Elite Arcanist | Card Name
M14·54 | Elite Arcanist | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may exile an instant card from your hand.\n{X}, {T}: Copy the exiled card. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. X is the mana value of the exiled card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从你手上放逐一张瞬间牌。{X}，{T}：复制所放逐的牌。你可以施放该复制品，且不需支付其法术力费用。X为所放逐的牌之总法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: M14·57 | Galerider Sliver | Card Name
M14·57 | Galerider Sliver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sliver creatures you control have flying.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的裂片妖生物具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.resname: M14·58 | Glimpse the Future | Card Name
M14·58 | Glimpse the Future | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的三张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，其余的牌则置入你的坟墓场。

M14·59 | Illusionary Armor | Card Text | Paragraphs

trans-unit.target: 结附于生物所结附的生物得+4/+4。当所结附的生物成为咒语或异能的目标时，牺牲CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: M14·61 | Jace's Mindseeker | Card Name
M14·61 | Jace's Mindseeker | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target opponent mills five cards. You may cast an instant or sorcery spell from among them without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 飞行当CARDNAME进战场时，目标对手将其牌库顶的五张牌置入其坟墓场。你可以施放其中的一张瞬间或法术牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。
